name: Jonah and the Whale
description:
Jonah is a hard as nails ex cop who doesn't take flack from anyone.

The Whale is a crudely drawn whale with a stupid looking smile.

For no reason whatsoever, they decide to destroy all the bees in the area. To do so, they need to be close enough to create the rainbow line of friendship to use their weapons.

Jonah can only walk on land. Whale can only swim on water.

Two player cooperative

Player one - Jonah

Player two - Whale

Winnitron Instructions:

Move with stick. Hold down button one to fire and use stick to point.

PC instructions:
Payer One: Move with Arrows/WASD and hold Z to shoot when close to your partner.

Player Two: Move with IJKL and hold N to shoot when close to your partner.

Destroy all bees and bee hives to go to the next room.

Both players share the health bar.

By Adam Hartling - XenosNS - 2015

Created for the Winnitron Resurretion Jam , June 29 to June 31, 2015
